name: Hilton Garden Inn Stuttgart NeckarPark

reviews.text: We got a suite and it was ezcellent and very roomy. Larger than an average suite. Very clean as you will expect from Hilton family hotels. Underground parking with direct access to the hotel. The hotel is right next to Stuttgart Mercedes-Benz Arena. It's very easy to come by car but I wouldn't necessarily walk late at night. Surrounded by large empty areas. Inside the hotel, the guest needs to navigate to the room thru connecting buildings. Breakfast perfectly fine, fresh waffles. Not superb and somehow limited choices but everything's good and quality. Mercedes-Benz museum is walking distance. Museum is really good, fun, interactive. Suite has a small sauna !
reviews.title: Efficient, clean, interesting: great stay

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Got stuck in Stuttgart and had to do a last minute stay. I investigated prices of various hotels on the internet but due to concerns of safety booking at an internet cafe, I called around to the hotels to secure a room. HGI was the only hotel that agreed to meet their internet pricing, understanding my concerns for credit card fraud.
reviews.title: Very friendly place

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The front desk staff is extremely helpful and friendly. This hotel is not in the center of town. It is very close to the Mercedes Museum. I was given very clear instructions on how to get there by public transport (no car). For those with cars, there is ample paid parking in the vicinity.
reviews.title: 1st Time to Europe

reviews.text: Check-in was quick and efficient, with the offer of an apple and/or pretzel.
reviews.title: This is a great hotel

reviews.text: The room was large for Europe. The bed extremely comfortable and the bathroom modern. It was extremely hot in Stuttgart then and the air conditioner did not appear to be working well. Only in the morning did we discover that the window was left open a little bit, which shut the air conditioner off.
reviews.title: Great Place in Stuttgart

reviews.text: This property is definitely a step above. This is nicer than most Garden Inns stateside. I was really
reviews.title: Not your typical Hilton Garden Inn

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: impressed with the rooms., location, and amenities. Hotel sits between Porsche Arena and
reviews.title: very nice place

reviews.text: Benz stadium. Mercedes museum is 5 minute walk from hotel. Front desk staff helpful and
reviews.title: Cannstatter Wasen

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: no communication issues. Rooms well decorated and spacious. Beds comfortable. Breakfast
reviews.title: Enjoyable stay in Stuttgart!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: buffet hand nice selection of items, well prepared. Service in restaurant was good. I would return
reviews.title: Good hotel next to benz museum. Free parking.

reviews.text: This hotel is the only 4-star good chain hotel around NeckarPark and they are using this very good. I had stayed in this hotel in the past with again a high price around EUR 130-140 (the location was convenient and at that time it was worth to pay). This week I checked the prices for the weekend and the standard room price is EUR 260 excluding the breakfast !!!! and don't forget this is a 4-star hotel.
reviews.title: Totally overpriced

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: In general this hotel is good (if you are ready to pay an exorbitant price). Car park is next to the hotel and the rooms are fine. But, if you consider the price and so the quality/price ratio is thus very low.
reviews.title: Handily located

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We were planning to visit the Mercedes-Benz Museum and discovered the HIlton Garden Inn was just a few minutes' walk away, so this is where we booked to stay. The hotel is easy to find as it is situated between the Mercedes-Benz Stadium and the Porsche Arena. Free onstreet parking can be found all round the area, but it tends to fill up early; however, the hotel also has underground parking at a reasonable price. This was our option as it seemed safer.
reviews.title: Convenient to the Mercedes museum and arena

reviews.text: The staff were welcoming and very friendly. Our room was large and spotlessly clean with large windows. We enjoyed two good nights' sleep.
reviews.title: Modern, clean and efficient hotel

reviews.text: Breakfast was excellent with an enormous range. As a type 2 diabetic I have to be careful about what I eat, but I had no difficulties with the choice of cooked breakfast - eggs, bacon, sausages, etc., smoked salmon and other smoked fish or yoghurts, fruit and cereals.
reviews.title: First class accommodation and service in an out of town location.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed there on a trip up to Frankfurt. Nice welcome in the evening with butter prezels at the reception. Modern building, great breakfast buffet. Just located next to the football arena and perfect for Kanstattervasen or however this is called. Dogs are welcomed.
reviews.title: Nice, good location

reviews.text: The hotel was nice and the staff was great. The workout facility was better than most HGI's in the US. The BIG negative was the restaurant. The food was less than good and it was way overpriced.
reviews.title: Nice hotel with a great staff.

reviews.text: The location was great. It was easy to get anywhere in the Stuttgart area. I will stay there again but will avoid the restaurant.
reviews.title: Excellent hotel

reviews.text: This is a very good, smart, contemporary hotel. The room was very clean, quiet and had a good sized bathroom. The breakfast was amazing - huge buffet style with large selection and many staff to make sure that everything was being replenished. front desk staff were also very helpful. We were able to park the car for free on the street but for a fee there is a car park attached. Easy walk to the fantastic Mercedes Museum and good sports bar few steps from the hotel for inexpensive, good quality dinners.Wifi in rooms also worked well.
reviews.title: Modern hotel- but not lavish

reviews.text: All together a great stay and we shall definitely stay again on our next trip to Stuttgart.
reviews.title: The only place to stay for the Mercedes Benz Museum

aka: Hilton Garden Inn Stuttgart Neckarpark Hotel
